PHRASE.LANG: This cloud will truly make you feel like it's the worst day ever. [#Legal]
Vous aurez l'impression que c'est le pire jour de votre vie. [#Legal]
Diese Wolke zeigt man an absolut miesen Tagen. [#Legal]
Questa nuvola renderà la tua giornata ancora peggiore. [#Legal]
Esta nube te hará sentir que es el peor día de tu vida. [#Legal]
이 구름과 함께 가장 힘든 당신의 하루를 표현하세요. [#Legal]
This cloud will truly make you feel like it's the worst day ever. [#Legal]
這片雲的確會令你覺得這是有史以來最差勁的一天。 [#Legal]
